title: New: BASECAMP – Emmanuel
content:
Nashville trio BASECAMP, aka Aaron Miller, Aaron C.

Harmon and Jordan Reyes, have a sound that’s about as current as any new artist round. Glitchy R&B may well be in abundance at this moment in time, but there’s few doing it quite as well as this trio, as shown by their addictive debut outing, Emmanuel. Layered vocals and choppy synths all underpinned by an almost early 00’s UK garage style beat form what is be one of the finest introductions to any artist this year.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
